meanings.definition: A blind spot in the field of vision.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't see the car approaching due to the scotoma in her vision.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the scotoma was causing her difficulty in reading.
meanings.sent3: During the game of hide and seek, his scotoma made it impossible for him to find his friends.
meanings.sent4: The scotoma in her vision was like a hidden trap waiting to surprise her.
meanings.sent5: The scotoma felt like a mysterious hole in her sight, swallowing objects whole.

meanings.definition: An area of diminished or lost vision within the visual field.
meanings.sent1: The scotoma in his visual field made it hard for him to see clearly.
meanings.sent2: The scotoma affected her ability to navigate through crowded places.
meanings.sent3: His scotoma seemed to play hide and seek with the objects around him.
meanings.sent4: The scotoma was like a shadow creeping over his vision, obscuring details.
meanings.sent5: The scotoma was a dark cloud in his sight, blocking out the world around him.
